Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and exceptional craftsmanship. We believe it could significantly enhance your life or business in numerous ways. Considering its immense value, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this opportunity. If you have any questions or would like more information about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
